main event: A large, football-shaped object with a bright, yellowish-white light was sighted hovering over a field in Frankfort, Kentucky.
interesting points: The object was self-luminous and the light was most intense at the center, diminishing towards the outer edges.
The object was completely silent and did not emit any heat.
The witness could not determine the exact distance of the object.
The weather was clear at the time of the sighting.
The object hovered for several minutes before swiftly flying away.
